title.narrative: PRODUCTION OF STRATEGIC INFORMATION

description.narrative: By 2018, the National Statistical Information System provide disaggregated data and strategic information needed to analyze the situation of child deprivation, and children and women vulnerability., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Preparedness and response in CPie are effective.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, the National Statistical Information System provide disaggregated data and strategic information needed to analyze thesituation of child deprivation, and children and women vulnerability.

description.narrative: In 2019, the CO launched its equity-focused situation analysis of children and adolescents which has informed the Country Programme Documents 2020-2024 and in collaboration with other UN agencies, supported the government to produce its Voluntary National Review, the production. In addition, he CO supported the country during the CRC reporting process until the submission of the national report to the Committee on the Rights of the Child. | Status:Met | As-of Date:10/02/2020
